ad_text: Byland Transportation Sponsored Byland Transportation now hiring Class A CDL local, regional, and over the road truck drivers. When you go the extra mile, you should be rewarded. That's why we offer CDL-A truck driver opportunities with excellent starting pay rates and a host of great benefits. We are looking forward having you on our team. Benefits: OTR/Regional - W-2 Driver: 62 cpm No Touch and Touch Freight New Freightliner Trucks (2020-2023 models) Weekly Pay/Direct Deposit Referral Bonuses Safety component bonus Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance 1099 Driver: 65 cpm No Touch and Touch Freight New Freightliner Trucks (2020-2023 models) Weekly Pay/Direct Deposit Referral Bonuses Safety component bonus Local/Regional W-2 Driver: $25/hour No Touch and Touch Freight New Freightliner Trucks (2020-2023 models) Weekly Pay/Direct Deposit Referral Bonuses Safety component bonus Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance 1099 Driver: $26/hour No Touch and Touch Freight New Freightliner Trucks (2020-2023 models) Weekly Pay/Direct Deposit Referral Bonuses Safety component bonus Requirements: Must have 2 years of Class A experience Must be at least 22 years old Must have a valid Class A CDL Must have good MVR and stable work history Must Pass Drug Test, DOT Physical We are looking forward to having you on our team!
